#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	int arr[26];
	char c;
	//C,C#,D,D#,E,F,F#,G,G#,A,B and S
	int arrC[10]={9,10,0,2,4,5,7,11};
	int arrs[8]={0,0,1,3,0,6,8};
	while(t--)
	{int ind[3];
		
		for( int i=0;i<3;i++)
		{
		cin>>c;
		if(c>='a')ind[i]=arrs[c-'a'];
		else if(c=='S')ind[i]=11;
		else ind[i]=arrC[c-'A'];
	}
	int first,second;
	//cout<<ind[0]<<" "<<ind[1]<<" "<<ind[2]<<endl;
	if(ind[0]>ind[1])first=12+ind[1]-ind[0];
	else first=ind[1]-ind[0];
	if(ind[1]>ind[2])second=12+ind[2]-ind[1];
	else second=ind[2]-ind[1];
	
	//cout<<first<<" "<<second<<" "<<endl;
	
	if(first==4 )cout<<"Major"<<endl;
	else cout<<"Minor"<<endl;
	
	
		
	}
	
	return 0;
}
